[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1537521376465{padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-image: url(https://futuretechliving.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/bg.png?id=9170) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}” el_class=”overlapped”][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1536745119080{margin-top: 110px !important;margin-right: 1px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]What we do[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1704379506149{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Experts in Home Technology

Home automation involves using technology to control and automate household systems and devices, such as lighting, heating, ventilation, air conditioning, appliances, security cameras, and more. It enables remote monitoring and control, scheduling, and often integrates with voice commands or mobile apps for convenient management of various aspects of your home.[/vc_column_text]View Services[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

01

Media Walls

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]
02

Smart Lighting

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]
03

Security & CCTV

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1703832468677{padding-top: -20px !important;padding-bottom: -20px !important;background-image: url(https://futuretechliving.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/futuretech-solutions-13.webp?id=13982) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”spaced overlayeight”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1539687375928{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”animate”][vc_column_text]

Take your living spaces to the next level with Future Tech.

[/vc_column_text]Take a step, touch the future![/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”animate animate-1″][vc_column_text]

Dive into a realm where innovation meets lifestyle with Future Tech. Experience the magic of immersive Cinema Rooms, where every frame comes alive. Illuminate your world intelligently with our Smart Lighting solutions, setting the perfect ambiance for every moment. Elevate your visual storytelling with our state-of-the-art Media Walls, turning every space into a captivating canvas.

Safety and connectivity remain paramount. With our advanced Security & CCTV systems and reliable Aerial & Distribution Systems, we ensure you’re always connected and protected. And for the meticulous organizers, our Racks provide the perfect blend of design and functionality.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1534837399175{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”15″ css=”.vc_custom_1703751686061{margin-top: 100px !important;margin-bottom: 100px !important;}” el_class=”mobile-full”][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”animate”][vc_single_image image=”13569″ img_size=”700×900″ alignment=”center” onclick=”img_link_large” css=”.vc_custom_1703751987940{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”animate animate-1″][vc_row_inner el_class=”overlap-left”][vc_column_inner el_class=”shadow-box”]We work differently.[vc_column_text]

Integrating technology with elegance & we redefine spaces decisions.

Through thoughtful design and advanced solutions, we seamlessly merge cutting-edge technology like embedded TVs and smart lighting, crafting immersive cinematic environments for every home.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

  • Idea
  • Design
  • Execution

In the inception phase, we meticulously brainstorm to understand your vision.

Our team collaborates to generate innovative ideas that form the foundation of a personalized and technologically advanced living space.

With a keen eye for aesthetics and functionality, our design experts transform concepts into detailed plans.

We focus on creating seamless integration for embedded TVs, smart lighting, and home cinema setups, ensuring both style and efficiency.

Bringing your vision to life, our skilled team handles the precise installation of embedded TVs and state-of-the-art technology.

With careful execution, we turn design concepts into reality, crafting sophisticated and immersive environments for a modern living experience.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1703764465088{background: #f5f5f5 url(https://futuretechliving.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/image-process-2.jpg?id=13941) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”spaced”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1536744548657{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]How we work[vc_column_text el_class=”animate”]

What our clients say?

Nicole Pratt

Team Member

Highly recommend their service!

When my husband and I were looking for a new media wall design, we knew it had to be Future Tech Living Solutions. They created the most modern design that can blend in with any surrounding. The installation process was seamless and they really made our old house feel brand new. Highly recommend their service!

Hayden Davey

Team Member

I can't believe everything that it does!

Without a doubt, the best thing we've ever done for our company is invest in this lighting system. I can't believe everything that it does. The best part is that Future Tech Living Solutions was so helpful with making sure everything was set up correctly and doing a walkthrough of the system before installation!

Leo Chamberlain

Team Member

Thanks to Future Tech Living Solutions

We had this incredible cinema room designed by Future Tech Living Solutions and it was the best decision we ever made. The cinemas features a variety of equipment that catered to the needs of all our guests. We now get to watch movies in complete style and luxury, thanks to Future Tech Living Solutions's genius design.
